title: Notes on Unfair Papers by Mebarki et al. on ``Quantum Nonsymmetric Gravity''
abstract: It is pointed out that the essential parts of some recent papers by Mebarki {\it et al.} (hep-th/9911045, hep-th/9911046, hep-th/9911048, hep-th/9911049, dated 6 Nov.1999) are taken from a book written by Nakanishi and Ojima, published in 1990.
